name: My Medidata
description: Implemented patient onboarding and setup within the myMedidata portal, enabling automated and simplified reimbursements and stipends for clinical trial participants. Enhanced patient experience by streamlining compensation for travel, childcare, meals, lost wages, and mileage directly through their myMedidata accounts.

name: AnG & Availity Provider portal Integration:
description: Integrated Availity multi-payer appeals application with Molina Healthcare, enabling providers to efficiently submit and track claim appeals and coverage reevaluation requests.

name: AnG
description: Designed and enhanced Appeals & Grievances systems to improve case tracking, auditability, and reporting for Medicaid, Medicare, and Marketplace business lines.

name: Pursuit
description: Developed a clinical data platform that generated state-compliant PDF records and securely transmitted them via RightFax, improving provider access to member clinical information.

name: Utilization Management
description: Built a web-based workflow system supporting Prior Authorization, Case Management, Pharmacy, and Behavioral Health operations across multiple health plans.

name: New Client Implementation
description: Led development of Medicare/Medicaid data extracts, operational reports, and CMS-compliant interface programs during onboarding of new health plan clients.

name: IMServ EDV Solution
description: Delivered energy data management solutions enabling organizations to reduce energy costs, control carbon emissions, and improve sustainability reporting.

name: Patient Inquiry Application (PIA) & Patient Portals
description: Built Silverlight and ASP.NET web applications for patient demographic lookups, payment tracking, and self-service portals to improve patient engagement.

name: Lorenzo Patient record systems
description: Contributed to one of the worldâ€™s leading healthcare information management systems, supporting clinicians and patients with integrated, patient-centered care solutions.

name: Coopslimited, Alipes & kothattai, Web App
description:
Developed multiple web and kiosk applications, including: 
 **CoopsLimited.com** - A business vetting platform ensuring trusted service providers. 

 **Alipes Kiosk** - A touch-based foot treatment and shoe customization solution. 

 **Kothattai.com** - An online vehicle movement system for managing fleets and logistics.
